verses.text: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* beautiful \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* feet \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* shoes, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* king's daughter! \w The|strong="H7725"\w* curves \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* legs \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* jewels, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* work \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* good workman:

\w Your|strong="H3027"\w* stomach \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* store \w of|strong="H1323"\w* grain \w with|strong="H3027"\w* lilies round \w it|strong="H3644"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3303"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* middle \w a|strong="H3644"\w* round cup full \w of|strong="H1323"\w* wine.
\w Your|strong="H0408"\w* two breasts are \w like|strong="H7799"\w* two young roes \w of|strong="H6194"\w* \w the|strong="H0408"\w* same \w birth|strong="H0990"\w*.

Your neck is as a tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* ivory; your eyes like \w the|strong="H8147"\w* waters \w in|strong="H8147"\w* Heshbon, \w by|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* doorway \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Bath-rabbim; your nose is as \w the|strong="H8147"\w* tower on Lebanon looking over Damascus:

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H0639"\w* \w like|strong="H0639"\w* Carmel, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hair \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H0639"\w* \w like|strong="H0639"\w* purple, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H4026"\w* net \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0639"\w* prisoner.
How beautiful \w and|strong="H4428"\w* how sweet \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w*, O love, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* delight.

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* tall like \w a|strong="H4100"\w* palm-tree, \w and|strong="H3302"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* breasts \w are|strong="H4100"\w* like \w the|strong="H4100"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H0160"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* vine.

\w I|strong="H1819"\w* said, Let \w me|strong="H1819"\w* go up \w the|strong="H1819"\w* palm-tree, and let \w me|strong="H1819"\w* take its branches \w in|strong="H1819"\w* my hands: your \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* will be as \w the|strong="H1819"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* vine, and \w the|strong="H1819"\w* smell \w of|strong="H6967"\w* your breath \w like|strong="H1819"\w* apples;

\w And|strong="H0639"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* roof \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* mouth \w like|strong="H1961"\w* good wine flowing \w down|strong="H0639"\w* smoothly \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* loved \w one|strong="H1961"\w*, moving gently over \w my|strong="H1961"\w* lips \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* teeth.

I \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w for|strong="H2896"\w* \w my|strong="H1980"\w* loved one, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* desire \w is|strong="H1730"\w* \w for|strong="H2896"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w*.

Come, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* loved one, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* go \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field; let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* take rest \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cypress-trees.

Let \w us|strong="H7704"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* early \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vine-gardens; let \w us|strong="H7704"\w* see if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vine \w is|strong="H1730"\w* \w in|strong="H3318"\w* bud, if it \w has|strong="H3318"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* young fruit, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* pomegranate \w is|strong="H1730"\w* \w in|strong="H3318"\w* flower. There I \w will|strong="H7704"\w* give you \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* mandrakes \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* sweet smell, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* doors \w are|strong="H8033"\w* all sorts \w of|strong="H3754"\w* good fruits, new \w and|strong="H8033"\w* old, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* loved \w one|strong="H0518"\w*.
